name.str: Shellback ceramic small plate, NIJ III+
name.str_pl: Shellback ceramic small plates, NIJ III+

description: A SAPI-cut ballistic plate with a single-curve profile, made of alumina and wrapped in UHMWPE, produced by Shellback Tactical.  This plate is rated for NIJ III+, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is sized "small" and can only fit in carriers that allow small-sized plates.

notes: though there doesn't appear to be any information on the thickness of this particular model of plates, we presume it to be 1.1″ based on similar models

damage_verb: makes a crunch, something has shifted

description: This ceramic plate has been taken out of service by the damage it had suffered.  It will no longer provide significant protection against bullets, and should be replaced or thrown away.
